description: This Python script demonstrates how to store agent sessions and chat history in a SQLite database, involving agents for stock and web search, and a team coordinating their interactions.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific roles, models, tools, and storage.

classes.name: Memory
classes.description: Handles storage and retrieval of chat sessions and history.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Coordinates multiple agents and manages team-level configurations.

classes.name: SqliteStorage
classes.description: Provides SQLite database storage for sessions and chat history.

methods.name: print_chat_history
methods.description: Prints the chat history for a given session run.
